name: Spring In Your Step (Open Beta)
description:
Spring in Your Step

AKA. SiYS

A new game from BlackOut Studios, Spring in Your Step is a rage game & platformer mix that combines all the frustration of Getting Over It and the mechanics of a platformer to deliver a brand new, keyboard-smashing, headache-inducing, rage-filling experience.

Bounce around on cute little platforms as a (usually)circular boi to climb up the world, from the ground up to the reaches of the galaxy.
